column1: Computer Science (Computer Networks and Security) - MSc
column3: School of Digital, Technologies and Arts
column5: Secure your future career with our Computer Science (Computer Networks and Security) MSc. You’ll become a highly trained networking/security professional with the ability to adapt to the ever-changing corporate network environment.In the digitally connected world, companies are reliant on their information networks for critical storage, distribution and processing. These networks need constant maintenance to keep them operational, resilient and efficient – this is where you come in.
column7: Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on the website
